body.name: JUKMO Ratchet Golf Belt for Men, Nylon Web Tactical Belt with Automatic Slide Buckle
features: UNIQUE INNOVATION: This is a new combination of nylon webbing belt and automatic slide ratchet buckle. Our ratchet buckle is made by zinc alloy, which make the buckle be unbreakable. Our nylon webbing belts are thicker than the normal webbing belt, which has very strong load-bearing capacity, which can meet your different wearing requirements.

EASY TO USE: Just put the webbing through the buckle and adjust to the perfect fit. If you want to unstrap, just push the trigger and pull the webbing out. It is very easy and convenient for everyone to use

FOR EVERYONE: Our durable belt is a perfect daily belt. For Tactical, strong load-bearing and stay tight; For Casual, match casually and comfortable; For Youth, simple and convenient; For Business, fashion and personality; For Elder, convenient and comfortable
AS A PRESENT：Our elaborate belt is enclosed in an elegant gift box for you giving whoever you love, or yourself

SHOPPING GUARANTEE：If you meet any problems after purchasing the belt, it is free to return or replace. If it past the return time, please don't hesitate to contact us by Amazon message. We promise to provide you 100% satisfaction guarantee

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality across the board, milspec
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Liked EVERYTHING. ORDER NOW. Upon opening the stunning box , I found an equally stunning pouch that contained yet another stunning aspect...the product. Belt is Milspec grade, webbing belt buckle device, locking adjustment, fitting of the belt, width not too wide and will fit all pants casual, dress, or tactical. Tail of the belt fits underneath the exterior of the belt so it is pinned against the body with no unsightly tail exposed. The painted buckle is a high quality flat black bonded to the metal and the locking device simple, effective and easy to manage. The loose end or running end of the belt uniformly trimmed and heat sealed rounded tip means no pointed corners to ruin the appearance or cause discomfort. Delivery fast. Order this for Christmas NOW.SMOKING QUALITY, PRICE, FIT, AND PRESENTATION. 5 STARS ACROSS THE BOARD.I ORDERED ALL COLORS. BADA BING, BADA BOOM. HOOOOORAAAAW! GET SOME, MARINE!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Micro adjustable. Best belt I own, sturday for everyday use.
reviews.reviewText: Like other have said, the buckle screws will come loose. That's an easy fix. Just take out the screws one at a time a put a small drop of loctite on the screw or thread hole and retighten. It will never come loose again. I love how you can adjust the belt at very small increments unlike a traditional belt. Also the extra belt material slides behind instead of over the buckle so it doesn't flap around for a nice clean look. Material is thick and sturdy. I use it with my edc holster daily. Will be ordering a few more in different colors. Definitely recommend this over other nylon belts I have tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is great belt!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great belt. My pants waist size is 34". I did not have to do any trimming. Unfortunately, the belt clasp broke after about 2 years. The end of the rod fell off. Belt did look and adjust great for 2 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Handsome, minimal packaging.Belt material looks and feels high quality.Ratcheting mechanism does feel a little flimsy, but works fine. Practice using the belt and don't force it and it should last long enough considering the price point. I have a feeling the reviewers posting pictures of broken belts were forcing them instead of being patient. It feels sturdy enough to me and offers positive locking into all positions.I have found that it is easier to release the ratchet by putting light pressure on the release lever then pushing the belt inwards slightly as though you are tightening it. That releases tension and allows easy removal.I've also found i prefer to press on the locking bar on the back of the buckle directly to release ratchet tension. I might actually grind off the little lever nub thing out of personal aesthetic preference and elimination of a snag point.At first i though the ratchet bar was going to be a comfort issue because it seems to stick out of the rear quite far. In fact, it seems to settle into the gap where the button on my Levis fasten quite nicely and acts as a locator tab, helping to keep the belt in place. It is not uncomfortable or annoying.I could live without the branding on the front and the fake belt loop thing on the buckle but it is an otherwise subtle and handsome looking belt and the black finish looks nice and durable.Overall a high quality product that has converted me to ratchet belts. I'll never buy a standard belt again. If it lasts more than a couple years this is an outstanding value.This is also an ideal belt solution for folks with a CCW license carrying on the waist in any position.But please, practice operation of the belt for a bit before wearing it because i almost pissed my pants cause i wasnt used to removing it yet -___-

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased with this belt ........ plus 10 month update
reviews.reviewText: Belt works great! One little thing I don't like. The little loop for trapping the excess seems pointless and falls off easily. But unless you've ordered one way too big for you, it doesn't need it anyway. I just left it off and pretend it never existed. Very pleased with belt. Looks good, latches good. A little bit of getting use to finding the release quickly but now that I'm use to it I wouldn't want it any different. Regular belts are what feel weird and clunky to me now.Update: I've worn this belt almost every day for 10 months now and if it wasn't for a couple tiny scratches I manged to put on the buckle, it's just as good as new. No stretching, no fraying and no signs of the the mechanism wearing out. I really like the way it looks and once you get used to the latch it is so much quicker and easier to use than a standard buckle. I will never go back to leather belts. I keep belts pretty snug and I probably would have stretched out 2 leather ones by now in this same time. And by stretched I mean when I lay them flat, they try to form a U because my belly stretches the top side more than the bottom. This belt has zero curve and is absolutely deserving of a 5 star rating. I also don't hesitate to clip something like a tape measure to it where as I've scratched up leather belts severely by doing that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Possibly the best wallet I’ve ever owned
reviews.reviewText: This belt is perfect. Excellent width especially as the material is thick. Length is accurate. No plastic ratchet on belt; it’s part of the weaving. Very reasonably priced given its design and quality. Ou’ll love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the trick but paint doesn't last.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these and love how easy they are to put on and take off. I'll never to back to traditional belts. I just wish they made them with durable finishes. Each one I've owned has had the paint scratch off the buckle in just a few months. Since the buckles are all black, why not make them out of black metal instead of painting them black? I was able to remove the buckles and repaint them but I shouldn't have to do this for an item that's less than a year old. I just bought a belt holder so maybe that will help keep them from getting dinged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very well made and functions perfectly.Definitely would buy again.
Es un excelente producto, además está muy elegante. Me gustó mucho y me ajusta excelente
This is one of the best belts ever, easy to adjust whenever. GoOut for a meal and need that extra room without having to find the next hole that might give too much room. I will order another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great belt. Durable and fits to specified size. Just ordered two more.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ein toller Gürtel - Kaufempfehlung mit gutem Bauchgefühl!
reviews.reviewText: Ich bin 184cm groß und 92kg schwer, recht sportlich habe aber ein "Lockdown-Bäuchlein". Im Sitzen misst mein Umfang am Bauchnabel 118cm :-) Daher habe ich den Gürtel in Größe L bestellt. Dieser ist wie beschrieben 135cm lang, ich habe also tatsächlich 17cm die noch durch die verschiebbare Schlaufe als Reserve für üppige Familienfeste dienen.Das Produkt ist wie abgebildet, das Metall der Schnalle ist sehr wertig und angenehm schwer. Das offene Nylon Ende wurde ganz passabel verarbeitet, hier und überhaupt steht nirgends ein Faden ab. Der Gürtel selbst ist exzellent gewebt und das schwarz "echt". Der Schließmechanismus "ratscht" angenehm aber nicht zu laut, ist überraschend präzise und der Pin zum Lösen lässt sich gut mit einer Hand am Gürtel bedienen. (Ich trage die Schnalle von mir ausgesehen links, der Pin ist also auf der Unterseite und kann mit dem linken Zeigefinger problemlos gelockert werden). Für den Preis eine absolute Kaufempfehlung.Das ggf. schwächste Glied an der Schnalle könnte meiner Erfahrung nach eines Tages der Lockerungspin sein. Sollte dieser aber 1-2 Jahre halten, kaufe ich mir auf jeden Fall diesen Gürtel erneut, denn der Gürtel sieht dem Urteil meiner Frau nach sehr gut aus und passt perfekt mit und zu jeder anprobierten Hose!
